title: Blended Learning-Based Competency Enhancement Program for Practical Skills in Social Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning utilizing simulation/VR in digitally equipped environments. Requires integration with online platforms enabling peer collaboration and real-time feedback

learning_goals: Learners can design scenarios to solve real-world social sector problems by applying a blended learning model
Learners can propose community conflict management strategies with over 80% accuracy using VR simulations
Learners can optimize learning outcomes through three or more peer feedback sessions using digital tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
